attributes.review: This app is so awful. There are just simply no words to align my feelings toward this disgrace of an app. I strongly urge you to give it a download and see for your self and tell everything how awful it is in better words
attributes.title: Absolutely horrid

attributes.review: Me my flamingo and my boyfriends girlfriend all absolutely hated this app😭it stole my microwave😡 and gave me an anxiety attack, so I had to go all the way to Taco Bell to get some amazing Italian food to call me down. This was absolutely ridiculous would not recommend🤬🤬🤬🤬
attributes.title: Awful

attributes.review: This app shouldn’t have been allowed on the platform to begin with. It glitches, it’s racist, orange, homophobic, and a danger to society. It also seems to support s3xual harassment. You’ve got to do better Apple 😤. Would rate 0 stars if possible.
attributes.title: A Disgrace to the App Store...

attributes.review: When I opened this app, I got a message saying that Alex Acosta’s demon children were coming to my house to kill me! I mean I love our president but this app is ridiculous. I am scared for my life. I mean have you seen those little demons, they will give you NIGHTMARES.  MAGA 2020🇺🇸 (no❤️)
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP

attributes.review: This app has made my life a living hell. It made my phone glitch and right after i downloaded my pet squirrel died, my parents got a divorce, my goldfish swam down the toilet hole, my dog was doing circles in the yard and hit a tree, my moose ran away, and my refrigerator exploded. TERRIBLE APP!
This app is a HOAX, it made my phone very slow which I didn’t have this problem before. Absolutely horrible, DO NOT, i repeat DO NOT download unless you want your phone glitching and bugging!
attributes.title: Glitchy and buggy

attributes.review: Donald Trump is abandoning TikTok because of a Chinese tech and because he was trolled “✌🏼” so that’s why y’all need to write reviews and leave the 1 star review so the Orange won’t abandon TikTok so please write reviews because if you don’t TikTok is going to be no where found
attributes.title: Donald Trump abandoning TikTok

attributes.review: It glitches so bad, has horrible news, doesn’t give me candy, it gave a virus to my computer, it doesn’t attract new friends, the list goes on and on people. Worst app ever. Like oh my gerda I cannot believe how bad it is anyways have a good day
attributes.title: SO BAD WORST THING EVER

attributes.review: immediately after downloading this app I got a notification asking to donate $100 dollars to the trump campaign. I click “no thanks” but it automatically filled in my name, address, and card info and took $100. don not get this!!!
attributes.title: SCAM

attributes.review: This app sends wayyyyy to many notifications a day and it makes my phone so glitchy and my phone dies as soon as I open the app. This app doesn’t even deserve any stars. It’s such an awful app please take this down
attributes.title: THIS APP IS AWFUL
